chefmod:OldKettle.NAME: Old Kettle
chefmod:OldKettle.FLAVOR: Actually, it gets along quite well with all other cookware.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Trusty Pot. The first attack card you draw each combat deals #b7 additional damage.

chefmod:PepperMill.NAME: Pepper Mill
chefmod:PepperMill.FLAVOR: The essential tool for the essential spice.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] each turn. Whenever you play a #ychefmod:Frozen card, lose [E] .

chefmod:RollingPin.NAME: Rolling Pin
DESCRIPTIONS: At the beginning of each combat, #ychefmod:Freeze #b3.

chefmod:Spatula.NAME: Spatula
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ychefmod:Freeze a card, deal #b4 damage to a random enemy.

chefmod:TrustyPot.NAME: Trusty Pot
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b5 #yBlock whenever you play the first card you draw in each combat.

chefmod:WoodenSpoon.NAME: Wooden Spoon
chefmod:WoodenSpoon.FLAVOR: Sturdy and well-used, this spoon has stirred many a meal.
